description: This file defines a REST controller in a Spring Boot application managing user profile information, including retrieving, updating user profile details, and notification preferences.

classes.name: UsersController
classes.description: Controller exposing user profile and preference APIs via REST endpoints, secured with Spring Security.

methods.name: me
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user's profile information.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates the display name of the current authenticated user.

methods.name: updatePrefs
methods.description: Updates the notification preferences for the current authenticated user.
